attributes.action: Scientific Testing on Pedophiles instead of Animals
attributes.additional_details:
How easier would it be if we could test on Humans instead of animals? Our DNA is 100% compatible with Humans. The torture and testing on animals is wrong, they are innocent, pedophiles however are disgusting creatures that are meant to be punished!

How would you feel if your child was molested? Would you want the Molester to receive protective custody in prison or being tested on to approve drugs, improve them and potentially save other peoples lives? Including Childerens'.
